tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE research_publications(
	publication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	publication_title VARCHAR(255),
	authors VARCHAR(255),
	publication_date DATE,
	publication_topic VARCHAR(100),
	publication_citation_count INT
);
CREATE TABLE publications (publication_id INT PRIMARY KEY, title TEXT, author TEXT, publication_date DATE);
CREATE TABLE literature (literature_id INT PRIMARY KEY, title TEXT, author TEXT, literature_type TEXT, publication_date DATE);

CREATE TABLE publications (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    author VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    publication_date DATE,
    journal VARCHAR(255),
    citation_count INT
);

CREATE TABLE publications_keywords (
	publication_id INT,
	keyword_id INT,
	PRIMARY KEY (publication_id, keyword_id),
	FOREIGN KEY (publication_id) REFERENCES research_publications(publication_id),
	FOREIGN KEY (keyword_id) REFERENCES keywords(keyword_id)
);
